summary: Losing his son Tom in a hit and run triggers violent emotions in Anthony, whose body begins to transform. When the driver who killed Tom reappears, Anthony mutates into a mass of metal - a human weapon fuelled by an uncontrollable rage.
cast: Eric Bossick|Akiko Monô|Yûko Nakamura|Stephen Sarrazin|Tiger Charlie Gerhardt|Prakhar Jain|Shin'ya Tsukamoto|Michael Duncan|Mike Duncan|Alan Koji|Sou Fujita|Markus Wambsganss|Hajime Izuki|Dwayne Lawler|Aldo La Riviere|Yutaka Mishima|Getto|Masaki Kurusu|Shin'ichi Kawahara|Tomorô Taguchi
keywords: metal|written and directed by cast member|part of trilogy|third part|sequel
title: Tetsuo: The Bullet Man
